title: Butternut Squash and Lentil Soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon groundnut oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh root ginger', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 pinch fenugreek seeds', '190g dry red lentils', '225g butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cubed', '5 tablespoons finely chopped fresh coriander', '475ml water', '1/2 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', 'salt and pepper to taste']
